song.singer: Arijit Singh , Shreya Ghoshal , Raj Pandit
song.lyrics:
Soch me hun jara ye kya ho gaya Lag raha hai mujhe sab naya naya (Oh janiya... Haal ye kaisa hai ishq ke jaisa hai Tune mujhe kya kar diya) - 2
Ched gaya aap hi tu wo saaj hai Khul gaya aap hi tu wo raaz hai (Oh janiya... Haal ye kaisa hai ishq ke jaisa hai Tune mujhe kya kar diya) - 2
Jaise hoton pe halki si aayi hassi lekin Aankhe ye geeli ho tu hai wo aansu janiya.. Ohh.. jaise nadan hu haira hu thoda paresha hu Samjhau kya khud ko has du ya ro du janiya Ha.. jaage inn khwaishon ko kaise me sulau janiya.. Ha ha job hi ho raha hai kaise me chupau janiya.. (Oh janiya... Haal ye kaisa hai ishq ke jaisa hai Tune mujhe kya kar diya) - 2

Hone de aj hallla Dekhe gali mohalla Chahat ke maathe chandan ka tika Hai raam seeta isme Janmo haya ki rasme Jinme mahobaton ka tarika Sikhegi chori aur sikhega chabila - 2 Raam siya ki dekho nirali hia... Prem leela - 2
(Lanka pati baware... Tanka zanki kyun kare) - 2 (Apane kutil bhav tu Janaki se rang pare) - 2 Le den karam kar tu Kuch laaj sharam kar tu Rawan tu kar yahan se rawani Gusse me kahe tu hot laal pila - 2 Raam siya hi hai ye nirali hai... Prem leela - 2
(Jaise radha shyam se Seeta mili raam se) - 2 (Sab ko aapna pyar yun Mil jaye aaram se) - 2 Samjho to aur bhappu Raju ko maal gappu Unko mile sapano ki raani Meena ho rajjo ho ya wo ho sheela - 2 Hey dekho re dekho re dekho re dekho re Prem leela - 2

Aa.. na..
Tujhse nazar jo hatati nahi hai Naino ne teri saajish rachi hai Ye ishq ki saayad nayi kaarigari hai Dil ko mere mujhpe nahi tujpe yakeen hai
Tere piche bhaage naina tose lage Ho…din raate jaage Bas tohe soche mann banwra Soche na aage naina tose lage
Hota tha ye pehle nahi Ik pal ko ab behle nahi Anjaam se hai bekhabar Kaisa hua iss pe assar Ziddi hai mann battiyan meri Sab radh kare pachhtayega Kyu ishq mein dil had kare
Tere piche bhaage naina tose laage O.. din raate jaage Bas tohe soche mann banwra Soche na aage naina tose laage
(Naina tose lage Naina, naina tose lage) - 3
Bekhud tujhe paane ko hai Tere kareeb aane ko hai Tu hi bata kuch raasta Lat teri deewane ko hai
Tere siva duniya saari farzi lage Milna tera mujhko rab ki marzi lage
Tere piche bhage naina tose lage Ho.. din raate jage Bas tohe soche mann banwra Soche na aage naina tose lage
Tujhse nazar jo hatati nahi hai Naino ne teri saazish rachi hai
(Naina tose laage Naina, naina tose laage) - 4

Khwabon mein bhi yeh socha nahi tha Ki dhoop bhi milegi chaaon mein Kabhi raaston mein bhi socha nahi tha Ki kaante bhi chubhenge paaon mein Kahaan le aayi khwahishein Hai dard ki ye jo baarishein Hai ghalti dil ki yaa phir Hai waqt ki ye saazishein
(Kuch peeche chhoota hai Kuch hai jo toota hai Lagta khuda bhi aaj hum se rootha hai) - 2
Kahaan le aayi khwaishein Hai dard ki ye jo baarishein
Hai ghalti dil ki yaa phir Hai waqt ki ye saazishein
Kahaan le aayi khwaishein Hai dard ki ye jo baarishein Wo.. ye khwaishein..

Bandeya tu munh mod ke na jaa – 2 Bandeya dehleez laangh ke na jaa Naina bechaare ro ro ke haare Chhod gaya tu kiske sahaare Ruk jaa re, naa jaa re – 2 Bandeyaa tu munh mod ke na jaa
Rab se.. hone lage shiqve hain - 2 Jab se tumne kahaa chalte hain Palkon se ashq ye kyun na gire Seene ki jalan ye kaise sahein Ruk jaa re, naa jaa re – 2 Bandeya tu munh mod ke na jaa
Raste khamosh kyun bethe hain Hmm raste khamosh kyun bethe hain Lamhe sehme se kyun rehte hain Kisi ka toh intezaar hai inhein Sapne kyun bewajah ye bune Ruk jaa re, naa jaa re - 2 Bandeya tu munh mod ke na jaa - 2

song.singer: Kaur B, Dr. Zeus, Kapil Sharma
song.lyrics:
Bam bam bam bole bam bam bam Babaji ki booti peeke Karenge hum fun) - 2
Aaj friday isko dry day nahi banate Sexy kapde pehan ke club ko jaate Babaji ki booti peeke set ho jaate Iss friday night ko ache bache ghar nahi jaate
(Bolo bam bam bam Bole bam bam bam) - 2
O loud music pe thumke lagate
(Bolo bam bam bam Bole bam bam bam) - 4
Hallu hallu teri heartbeat challu Chadhi hai tainu weed sohniye Baby.. baby.. main tere lai crazy Mainu vi saadi need sohniye
Pad baiyyan bana le mujhe saiyaan Ho jayegi paar naiya friday chadheya
Ho don't be saddy Tu doll te main teddy Mana loon tera daddy friday chadheya
(Bolo bam bam bam Bole bam bam bam) - 2
